00256 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL

00260 
00271 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
00272 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::integer_t(const BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE& b, bool
00273     force_thread_safety)
00274 {
00275     if (Nothrow) {
00276         try {
00277             data = b.data;
00278             if (!data.is_nan()) {
00279                 if (force_thread_safety && Threadsafe == false) data.make_unique();
00280             }
00281         } catch (std::exception&) {
00282             data.make_nan();
00283         }
00284     } else {
00285         data = b.data;
00286         if (force_thread_safety && Threadsafe == false) data.make_unique();
00287     }
00288 }

00291 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
00292 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::integer_t(const char *str, size_t base) {
00293     if (Nothrow) {
00294         try {
00295             if (str[0] == nan_text[0] && std::string(str) == nan_text) {
00296                 data.make_nan();
00297             } else {
00298                 data.from_string(str, base);
00299             }
00300         } catch (std::exception&) {
00301             data.make_nan();
00302         }
00303     } else {
00304         data.from_string(str, base);
00305     }
00306 }
00307 
00336 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
00337 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::integer_t(const char *str, char **endptr, size_t base)
00338 {
00339     if (Nothrow) {
00340         try {
00341             if (str[0] == nan_text[0]) {
00342                 std::string s(str);
00343                 if (s.substr(0, nan_text.length()) == nan_text) {
00344                     data.make_nan();
00345                     *endptr = str + nan_text.length();
00346                     return;
00347                 }
00348             }
00349             data.from_string(str, endptr, base);
00350         } catch (std::exception&) {
00351             data.make_nan();
00352         }
00353     } else {
00354         data.from_string(str, endptr, base);
00355     }
00356 }
00357 
00382 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
00383 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::integer_t(const std::string& str, size_t base) {
00384     if (Nothrow) {
00385         try {
00386             if (str == nan_text) data.make_nan();
00387             else data.from_string(str, base);
00388         } catch (std::exception&) {
00389             data.make_nan();
00390         }
00391     } else {
00392         data.from_string(str, base);
00393     }
00394 }

00417 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
00418 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::integer_t(const xint::binary_t b, bitsize_t bits) {
00419     if (Nothrow) {
00420         try {
00421             data.from_binary(b, bits);
00422         } catch (std::exception&) {
00423             data.make_nan();
00424         }
00425     } else {
00426         data.from_binary(b, bits);
00427     }
00428 }
00429 
00442 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
00443 BOOST_XINT_OTHER_TPL
00444 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::integer_t(const BOOST_XINT_OTHER_TYPE& b, bool
00445     force_thread_safety)
00446 {
00447     if (Nothrow) {
00448         try {
00449             if (b.is_nan()) {
00450                 data.make_nan();
00451             } else {
00452                 data = b._data();
00453                 if (!data.is_nan() && force_thread_safety && Threadsafe ==
00454                     false) data.make_unique();
00455             }
00456         } catch (std::exception&) {
00457             data.make_nan();
00458         }
00459     } else {
00460         if (b._data().is_nan()) throw exceptions::not_a_number();
00461         data = b._data();
00462         if (force_thread_safety && Threadsafe == false) data.make_unique();
00463     }
00464 }

00478 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
00479 template <typename Type> BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::integer_t(const Type n,
00480     typename boost::enable_if<boost::is_integral<Type> >::type*)
00481 {
00482     if (Nothrow) {
00483         try {
00484             if (std::numeric_limits<Type>::is_signed) data.set_signed(n);
00485             else data.set_unsigned(n);
00486         } catch (std::exception&) {
00487             data.make_nan();
00488         }
00489     } else {
00490         if (std::numeric_limits<Type>::is_signed) data.set_signed(n);
00491         else data.set_unsigned(n);
00492     }
00493 }

00495 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
00496 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE& BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::
00497     operator=(BOOST_XINT_COPY_ASSIGN_REF(type) c)
00498 {
00499     if (Nothrow) {
00500         if (c._data().is_nan()) data.make_nan();
00501         else {
00502             try {
00503                 data = c.data;
00504                 if (Threadsafe == true) data.make_unique();
00505             } catch (std::exception&) {
00506                 data.make_nan();
00507             }
00508         }
00509     } else {
00510         data = c.data;
00511         if (Threadsafe == true) data.make_unique();
00512     }
00513     return *this;
00514 }

00524 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
00525 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::operator~() const {
00526     if (Nothrow) {
00527         if (is_nan()) return *this;
00528         try {
00529             BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r(~data);
00530             if (Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique();
00531             return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00532         } catch (std::exception&) {
00533             return nan();
00534         }
00535     } else {
00536         BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r(~data);
00537         if (Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique();
00538         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00539     }
00540 }

00548 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
00549 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::operator-() const {
00550     if (Nothrow) {
00551         if (is_nan()) return *this;
00552         try {
00553             BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r(*this);
00554             if (Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique();
00555             r.data = -r.data;
00556             return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00557         } catch (std::exception&) {
00558             return nan();
00559         }
00560     } else {
00561         BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r(*this);
00562         if (Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique();
00563         r.data = -r.data;
00564         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00565     }
00566 }

00571     BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE b)
00572 {
00573     if (Nothrow) {
00574         if (b.is_nan()) data.make_nan();
00575         if (!is_nan()) {
00576             try {
00577                 data += b.data;
00578                 if (Threadsafe == true) data.make_unique();
00579             } catch (std::exception&) {
00580                 data.make_nan();
00581             }
00582         }
00583     } else {
00584         data += b.data;
00585         if (Threadsafe == true) data.make_unique();
00586     }
00587     return *this;
00588 }

00729 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
00730 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::operator++(int) {
00731     if (Nothrow) {
00732         if (is_nan()) return *this;
00733         try {
00734             BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r(data++);
00735             if (Threadsafe == true) { r._make_unique(); data.make_unique(); }
00736             return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00737         } catch (std::exception&) {
00738             data.make_nan();
00739         }
00740     } else {
00741         BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r(data++);
00742         if (Threadsafe == true) { r._make_unique(); data.make_unique(); }
00743         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00744     }

00834     }
00835     return *this;
00836 }
00837 
00846 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
00847 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::operator<<(bitsize_t shift)
00848     const
00849 {
00850     if (Nothrow) {
00851         if (is_nan()) return *this;
00852         try {
00853             BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r(data << shift);
00854             if (Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique();
00855             return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00856         } catch (std::exception&) {
00857             return nan();
00858         }
00859     } else {
00860         BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r(data << shift);
00861         if (Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique();
00862         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00863     }
00864 }

00897     if (Nothrow) {
00898         if (!is_nan()) {
00899             try {
00900                 data <<= shift;
00901                 if (Threadsafe == true) data.make_unique();
00902             } catch (std::exception&) {
00903                 data.make_nan();
00904             }
00905         }
00906     } else {
00907         data <<= shift;
00908         if (Threadsafe == true) data.make_unique();
00909     }
00910     return *this;
00911 }

01105 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
01106 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::nan() {
01107     if (Nothrow) {
01108         BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r;
01109         r._data().make_nan();
01110         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
01111     } else {
01112         throw exceptions::not_a_number();
01113     }
01114 }

01138 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
01139 template <class Type>
01140 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::random_by_size(Type& gen,
01141     bitsize_t size_in_bits, bool high_bit_on, bool low_bit_on, bool
01142     can_be_negative)
01143 {
01144     if (Nothrow) {
01145         try {
01146             return datatype::random_by_size(gen, size_in_bits, high_bit_on,
01147                 low_bit_on, can_be_negative);
01148         } catch (std::exception&) {
01149             return nan();
01150         }
01151     } else {
01152         return datatype::random_by_size(gen, size_in_bits, high_bit_on,
01153             low_bit_on, can_be_negative);
01154     }
01155 }

01197     }

01217 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
01218 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE abs(const BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n) {
01219     if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Nothrow) {
01220         if (n.is_nan()) return BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::nan();
01221         try {
01222             BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r(n._data().abs());
01223             if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique();
01224             return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
01225         } catch (std::exception&) {
01226             return BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::nan();
01227         }
01228     } else {
01229         BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r(n._data().abs());
01230         if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique();
01231         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
01232     }
01233 }
01234 
01253 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
01254 typename BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::divide_t divide(const BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE
01255     dividend, const BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE divisor)
01256 {
01257     if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Nothrow) {
01258         if (dividend.is_nan() || divisor.is_nan()) return typename
01259             BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::divide_t(BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::nan(),
01260                 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::nan());
01261         try {
01262             typename BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::datatype::divide_t rr =
01263                 detail::divide(dividend._data(), divisor._data());
01264             typename BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::divide_t r(rr.quotient,
01265                 rr.remainder);
01266             return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
01267         } catch (std::exception&) {
01268             return typename BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::divide_t(
01269                 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::nan(), BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::nan());
01270         }
01271     } else {
01272         typename BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::datatype::divide_t rr =
01273             detail::divide(dividend._data(), divisor._data());
01274         typename BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::divide_t r(rr.quotient, rr.remainder);
01275         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
01276     }
01277 }

01299 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE square(const BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n) {
01300     if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Nothrow) {
01301         if (n.is_nan()) return n;
01302         try {
01303             BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r = detail::square(n._data());
01304             if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique();
01305             return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
01306         } catch (std::exception&) {
01307             return BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::nan();
01308         }
01309     } else {
01310         BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r = detail::square(n._data());
01311         if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique();
01312         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
01313     }
01314 }

01324 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
01325 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE pow(const BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n, const
01326     BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE e)
01327 {
01328     if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Nothrow) {
01329         if (n.is_nan() || e.is_nan()) return BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::nan();
01330         try {
01331             BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r;
01332             pow(r._data(), n._data(), e._data());
01333             if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique();
01334             return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
01335         } catch (std::exception&) {
01336             return BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::nan();
01337         }
01338     } else {
01339         BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r;
01340         pow(r._data(), n._data(), e._data());
01341         if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique();
01342         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
01343     }
01344 }

01431 std::string to_string(const BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n, size_t base = 10, bool
01432     uppercase = false)
01433 {

01435         if (n.is_nan()) return nan_text;
01436         try {
01437             return to_string(n._data(), base, uppercase);
01438         } catch (std::exception&) {
01439             return std::string();
01440         }
01441     } else {
01442         return to_string(n._data(), base, uppercase);
01443     }

01657             return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);

01660         }

01663             modulus._data());

01815 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
01816 int is_prime(const BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n, callback_t callback = no_callback)
01817 {
01818     if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Nothrow) {
01819         if (n.is_nan()) return -2;
01820         try {
01821             return is_prime(n._data(), callback);
01822         } catch (std::exception&) {
01823             return -2;
01824         }
01825     } else {
01826         return is_prime(n._data(), callback);
01827     }
01828 }

01839 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL bool operator<(const BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n1, const
01840     BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n2)
01841 {
01842     if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Nothrow) {
01843         if (n1.is_nan() || n2.is_nan()) return false;
01844         try {
01845             return operator<(n1._data(), n2._data());
01846         } catch (std::exception&) {
01847             return false;
01848         }
01849     } else {
01850         return operator<(n1._data(), n2._data());
01851     }
01852 }
01853 
01854 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL bool operator>(const BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n1, const
01855     BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n2)
01856 {
01857     if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Nothrow) {
01858         if (n1.is_nan() || n2.is_nan()) return false;
01859         try {
01860             return operator>(n1._data(), n2._data());
01861         } catch (std::exception&) {
01862             return false;
01863         }
01864     } else {
01865         return operator>(n1._data(), n2._data());
01866     }
01867 }
01868 
01869 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL bool operator<=(const BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n1, const
01870     BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n2)
01871 {
01872     if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Nothrow) {
01873         if (n1.is_nan() || n2.is_nan()) return false;
01874         try {
01875             return operator<=(n1._data(), n2._data());
01876         } catch (std::exception&) {
01877             return false;
01878         }
01879     } else {
01880         return operator<=(n1._data(), n2._data());
01881     }
01882 }
01883 
01884 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL bool operator>=(const BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n1, const
01885     BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n2)
01886 {
01887     if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Nothrow) {
01888         if (n1.is_nan() || n2.is_nan()) return false;
01889         try {
01890             return operator>=(n1._data(), n2._data());
01891         } catch (std::exception&) {
01892             return false;

01894     } else {

01899 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL bool operator==(const BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n1, const
01900     BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n2)
01901 {
01902     if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Nothrow) {
01903         if (n1.is_nan() || n2.is_nan()) return false;
01904         try {
01905             return operator==(n1._data(), n2._data());
01906         } catch (std::exception&) {
01907             return false;
01908         }
01909     } else {
01910         return operator==(n1._data(), n2._data());
01911     }
01912 }

02168 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
02169 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE gcd(const BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE num1, const
02170     BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE num2)
02171 {
02172     if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Nothrow) {
02173         if (num1.is_nan() || num2.is_nan()) return
02174             BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::nan();
02175         try {
02176             BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r;
02177             gcd(r._data(), num1._data(), num2._data());
02178             if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique();
02179             return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
02180         } catch (std::exception&) {
02181             return BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::nan();
02182         }
02183     } else {
02184         BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r;
02185         gcd(r._data(), num1._data(), num2._data());
02186         if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique();
02187         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
02188     }
02189 }
02190

02212             return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
02213         } catch (std::exception&) {
02214             return BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::nan();
02215         }

02236 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
02237 int compare(const BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n1, const BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n2,
02238     bool ignoresign = false)
02239 {
02240     if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Nothrow) {
02241         if (n1.is_nan() || n2.is_nan()) return 2;
02242         try {
02243             return compare(n1._data(), n2._data(), ignoresign);
02244         } catch (std::exception&) {
02245             return 2;
02246         }
02247     } else {
02248         return compare(n1._data(), n2._data(), ignoresign);
02249     }
02250 }

02268 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
02269 size_t log2(const BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n) {
02270     if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Nothrow) {
02271         if (n.is_nan()) return 0;
02272         try {
02273             return log2(n._data());
02274         } catch (std::exception&) {
02275             return 0;
02276         }
02277     } else {
02278         return log2(n._data());
02279     }
02280 }

02284 #define BOOST_XINT_ANY_COMPARE(rtype, op) \
02285     template <class A0, class A1, class A2, class A3, class A4, typename N> \
02286     rtype op(const BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n1, const N n2) { \
02287         if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Nothrow) { \
02288             try { \
02289                 return op(n1, BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE(n2)); \
02290             } catch (std::exception&) { \
02291                 return rtype(0); \
02292             } \
02293         } else { \
02294             return op(n1, BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE(n2)); \
02295         } \
02296     } \
02297     \
02298     template <typename N, class A0, class A1, class A2, class A3, class A4> \
02299     rtype op(const N n1, const BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n2) { \
02300         if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Nothrow) { \
02301             try { \
02302                 return op(BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE(n1), n2); \
02303             } catch (std::exception&) { \
02304                 return rtype(0); \
02305             } \
02306         } else { \
02307             return op(BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE(n1), n2); \
02308         } \
02309     }

02321     template <class A0, class A1, class A2, class A3, class A4, typename N> \
02322     BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE op(const BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n1, const N n2) { \
02323         if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Nothrow) { \
02324             try { \
02325                 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r(op(n1, BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE(n2)));\
02326                 if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique(); \
02327                 return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r); \
02328             } catch (std::exception&) { \
02329                 return BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::nan(); \
02330             } \
02331         } else { \
02332             BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r(op(n1, BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE(n2))); \
02333             if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique(); \
02334             return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r); \
02335         } \
02336     } \
02337     \
02338     template <typename N, class A0, class A1, class A2, class A3, class A4> \
02339     BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE op(const N n1, const BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n2) { \
02340         if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Nothrow) { \
02341             try { \
02342                 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r(op(BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE(n1), n2));\
02343                 if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique(); \
02344                 return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r); \
02345             } catch (std::exception&) { \
02346                 return BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::nan(); \
02347             } \
02348         } else { \
02349             BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r(op(BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE(n1), n2)); \
02350             if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique(); \
02351             return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r); \
02352         } \
02353     }

02373 template <typename charT, typename traits, class A0, class A1, class A2, class
02374     A3, class A4> inline std::basic_ostream<charT,traits>&
02375     operator<<(std::basic_ostream<charT, traits>& out, const
02376     BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n)
02377 {
02378     if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Nothrow && n.is_nan()) return operator<<(out,
02379         nan_text);
02380     return operator<<(out, n._data());
02381 }
02382 
02383 template <typename charT, typename traits, class A0, class A1, class A2, class
02384     A3, class A4> inline std::basic_istream<charT,traits>&
02385     operator>>(std::basic_istream<charT, traits>& in, BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE&
02386     n)
02387 {
02388     if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Nothrow && in.peek()=='#') {
02389         // Must be either #NaN# or an error
02390         char buffer[6];
02391 
02392         // These are efficient and safe, but MSVC complains about them anyway.
02393         //std::streamsize size = in.readsome(buffer, 5);
02394         //buffer[size]=0;
02395 
02396         // Replacing them with these.
02397         char *p = buffer, *pe = p + 5;
02398         while (p != pe) in >> *p++;
02399         *p = 0;
02400 
02401         std::string str(buffer);
02402 
02403         if (str == boost::xint::nan_text) n = n.nan();
02404         else in.setstate(std::ios::failbit);
02405         return in;
02406     }
02407     return operator>>(in, n._data());
02408 }

02413 {
02414     left._swap(right);
02415 }

02443     static BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPENAME min BOOST_PREVENT_MACRO_SUBSTITUTION()
02444         throw()
02445     {
02446         if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPENAME::Bits)
02447             return -~(BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPENAME());
02448         else return 0;
02449     }
02450     static BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPENAME max BOOST_PREVENT_MACRO_SUBSTITUTION()
02451         throw()
02452     {
02453         if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPENAME::Bits)
02454             return ~(BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPENAME());
02455         else return 0;
02456     }
02457

02459     static const int digits10;

02466

02482         else return 0;
